document.full_text: indian spiritual guru sri sathya sai baba was buried on wednesday as hundreds of thousands of devotees flocked to pay their last respects at his temple in south india to a man revered as a living god.
document.title: indian guru sai baba buried in state funeral, thousands grieve
lines_and_colors: indian spiritual guru sri sathya sai baba was buried on wednesday as hundreds of thousands of devotees flocked to pay their last respects at his temple in south india to a man revered as a living god.
